comment: Steve Schaefer is perhaps the least endearing college educator I have ever faced. His class is expensive, unclear, and extremely presumptuous of pre-existing talent. If you arent already a professional photographer, dont take this class. He was rude and abrasive nearly all semester. I was one of three students to not withdraw out of the 16 total.

comment: Just do yourself a huge favor and don't take this man for any course. He is rude, unclear, and is not fit to be a teacher. I have no doubt he's a good photojournalist, but I have no idea how this guy has taught since 1991 as he is loud, argumentative, and gives feedback in the most demeaning and degrading way possible. I have 0 respect for him...

comment: He says he is a photojournalist but half of what he says about cameras is wrong. He's incredibly rude to students, has said he is a god to photography, constantly interrupts students during presentations, always speaks over you to tell you you're wrong before you've said a word, and says your photos are bad before you even show him your images.

comment: This class was both time consuming and incredibly expensive. The professor does very little teaching, and is easily irritated. He gives out a lot of work, but provides very little time to complete it, while at the same time expecting high quality work out of his students. Very interesting class, but the professor should be more accessible.

Worst class I have ever taken. He is not meant to be a professor of any sorts. He bases everything off of his opinions, not facts. Also this class was very EXPENSIVE!!!!
